name: Demiurge
description:
YOU HAVE DONE WRONG. REDEEM YOURSELF. HAVE PATIENCE.

Demiurge is a spiritual punishment simulator. You are stuck in a limbo dimension, however there is a way out. Completing a series of redeeming tasks will please the Demiurge and perhaps you will be released. The tasks are obtuse in nature... however heed the pleased song of your god as it rises, and know the descending tones mean you struggle in vain.
